resources.string: No data has been found for this location.

WalkWay: Info about the usage of the app.

We are here to make sure all the data from this app is explicit for users eyes only. The user is our main priority, the safety of the data is guaranteed. 

This app is used to locate nearby tracks for a user to explore.


We like to thank you on behalf of the whole WalkWay team (Roland) for the usage of the app!
